title: Workday
description: Configuration options that apply to records generated by the Workday Source.

Orgs_To_Keep.title: Orgs To Keep
Orgs_To_Keep.description: The teams underneath these orgs will be kept

Orgs_To_Ignore.title: Orgs To Ignore
Orgs_To_Ignore.description: The teams underneath these orgs will be ignored. If there is a keep org as a child of ignored, child will be kept.
